title: As omicron surges, U.S., U.K. and others shatter Covid records
content:
1. As omicron surges, U.S., U.K. and others shatter Covid records  NBC News
  2. U.S. hits record number of new COVID-19 infections Monday as Omicron variant spreads  CBS News
  3. CDC significantly reduces estimate of omicron prevalence in US  Fox News
  4. CDC data: Omicron still dominant despite revised estimates  CNN
  5. CDC drastically drops estimate of Omicron cases in US  New York Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オミクロンが急増し、米国、英国などがコビッドの記録を塗り替える
